content.webTitle: Escape's picks of the week: The spring escape

fields.headline: The Spring escape
fields.bodyText: Corsican Places (0845 330 2113) is offering discounts on some of its holiday properties in May. There is £312 off a two-bedroom apartment in Calvi, making it £359pp including return flights from Gatwick for departures 6, 13 and 20 May. Alternatively, a family villa with a private pool in St Florent costs £439pp, based on six sharing.
